verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1954>Hosea,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H882>Beeri,<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5818>Uzziah,<s%> <S%H3147>Jotham,<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz,<s%> and <S%H3169>Hezekiah,<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

The <S%H8462>beginning<s%> of the <S%H1696>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> by <S%H1954>Hosea.<s%> And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H1954>Hosea,<s%> <S%H1980>Go,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> unto thee a <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H2183>whoredoms<s%> and <S%H3206>children<s%> of <S%H2183>whoredoms:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> hath committed great <S%H2181>whoredom,<s%> <S%H2181><s%> departing <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H310><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

So he <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1586>Gomer<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H1691>Diblaim;<s%> which <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> him a <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H7121>Call<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3157>Jezreel;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> while, and I will <S%H6485>avenge<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3058>Jehu,<s%> and will cause to <S%H7673>cease<s%> the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass<s%> at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that I will <S%H7665>break<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7198>bow<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel.<s%>

And she <S%H2029>conceived<s%> <S%H5750>again,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1323>daughter.<s%> And God <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H7121>Call<s%> her <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3819>Lo-ruhamah:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H3254><s%> have mercy <S%H7355>upon<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> I will utterly take them <S%H5375>away.<s%> <S%H5375><s%>

But I will have mercy <S%H7355>upon<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and will <S%H3467>save<s%> them by the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> and will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> them by <S%H7198>bow,<s%> nor by <S%H2719>sword,<s%> nor by <S%H4421>battle,<s%> by <S%H5483>horses,<s%> nor by <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%>
Now when she had <S%H1580>weaned<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3819>Lo-ruhamah,<s%> she <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> God, <S%H7121>Call<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3818>Lo-ammi:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> are <S%H3808>not<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H595>I<s%> will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> your God.

Yet the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H4058>measured<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5608>numbered;<s%> and it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> it was <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H859>Ye<s%> are <S%H3808>not<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> there it shall be <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Ye are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H410>God.<s%>

Then shall the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be gathered <S%H6908>together,<s%> <S%H3162><s%> and <S%H7760>appoint<s%> themselves <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7218>head,<s%> and they shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H776>land:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> shall be the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel.<s%>
